medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms started 1 week ago as cramping epigastric pain, non-radiating, associated with meals (particularly fattier foods). Symptoms worsened with onset of nausea and vomiting with meals over the past few days, and persistent epigastric pain. Denies fever, chills, or recent weight loss. Experienced dark urine for 24 hours yesterday, which has resolved.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of von Willebrand disease, recurrent pharyngitis, obesity, and underwent tonsillectomy in 2006 with bleeding complications.
medical_history.family_history: Father had gastric bypass and cholecystectomy; paternal grandmother had cholecystectomy; paternal aunt had cholecystectomy and recent diagnosis of pancreatic cancer. No other cancers known.
